Item.Description:
This package includes all of the following items:

Canon T4i - 650DCanon EF-S 18-55 IS II LensCanon 75-300mm Lens58mm UV Filter4 Lens Macro Kit16GB SD Memory Card
Carrying Case for SLR CameraUSB SecureDigital™ Card ReaderLCD Screen ProtectorsLens Cleaning KitMemory Card Wallet
Lens shown for illustration

Canon EOS 650D - Rebel T4i Camera Body

Description

The Canon EOS Rebel T4i Digital Camera is the most sophisticated Rebel yet. It is an ideal camera for any level photographer. The new Rebel T4i delivers phenomenal image quality, high performance, and fast, intuitive operation.

This 18.0 megapixel DSLR features an APS-C-sized CMOS sensor and a DIGIC 5 image processor for fast operation and tremendous low light performance to an expanded ISO of 25600. A 9-point all cross-type AF system (including a high-precision dual cross f/2.8 center point) delivers improved autofocus performance, and a new Hybrid CMOS AF System increases autofocus speed when shooting photos and video in Live View.

Full HD 1080p video is supported and features a full-time Movie Servo AF system for continuous auto focusing while using live view to record movies. A built-in stereo microphone and manual audio level adjustment helps ensure that your audio will match the stunning quality of your video.

A 3.0" Vari-angle touch screen LCD is incorporated and flips out and tilts for viewing from a wide variety of angles. The touch screen operation is highly intuitive and even allows you to control your focus points from the LCD.

The Rebel T4i is compatible with SD/SDHC/SDXC memory cards and Canon's full line of EF and EF-S lenses.

GID ITEM ID: 01614   |   BACK TO TOP

Canon EF-S 18-55mm F3.5-5.6 IS II Lens

The EF-S 18-55 IS II is a lightweight and compact, standard zoom lens that is perfect for indoors as well as outdoors settings. It features an IS (Image Stabilizer) technology to compensate for movement, with a shutter speed up to four stops slower than otherwise possible, and to allow taking pictures under dim light conditions.
The lens is built with 11 elements in 9 groups and uses an Aspherical lens element to correct aberration and to deliver an accurate and sharp images.

elements/ groups: 11/9
Filter Size: 58mm
Length: 2.7 in. x 3.33 in
Weight: 7.1 oz.


GID ITEM ID: 01444   |   BACK TO TOP

Canon 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III EF Lens

Description
This Canon Telephoto Zoom lens offers Consistent Output, Sharp Focus and Strong Construction. It is Durable, Easily Interchangeable, Lightweight and Rugged as well, giving you the ability to fill the frame with a post card at 300mm.

Specifications
Focal length: 75-300mm
Maximum aperture: 1:4.5-5.6
Lens construction: 13 elements in 9 groups
Diagonal angle of view: 32 degrees to 8 degrees
Focus adjustment: Front group rotating extension system with USM
Closest focusing distance: 4.9 feet
Zoom system: Rotating type
Filter size: 58mm
Dimensions: 2.8 inches in diameter, 4.8 inches long
Weight: 16.8 ounces


GID ITEM ID: 00030   |   BACK TO TOP

58mm UV Digital Filter

Description
A UV filter reduces unwanted ultra-violet light and protects your lens from scratches, dust, dirt, moisture and fingerprints.

Product Features
Ultraviolet filters allows to correct for the UV effect
Multi-Coated Optical Glass
Enhanced Optical Resolution
Includes Protective Carrying Case

GID ITEM ID: 00135   |   BACK TO TOP

Digital MACRO Kit - 4 Close-up Lenses

Product Description

These lenses can be used individually or in any combinations to achieve maximum magnification.They are double threaded and you can use additionally other filters: polarizer, UV filter and more. Combination of a +1 lens with +2 will be equal +4 lens. Combination of a +2 lens with +4 will give you +6 lens

Specification

High Quality Fully Multi-Coated Filters
High-index / low dispersion optical glass
Anti-reflection coating
High speed auto-focus
Infrared compatible

Contents:

58mm +1 Close Up lens
58mm +2 Close Up Lens
58mm +4 Close Up lens
58mm + 10 macro lens
Handy Travel Case For 4 Filters

GID ITEM ID: 00279   |   BACK TO TOP

16 GB Secure Digital (SD) Memory Card

Secure Digital (SD) is a highly secure stamp-sized digital memory card.
SD Cards can be used in a variety of digital products; digital cameras, music players, cellular phones, handheld PCs, digital video camcorders, car navigation systems and others.

Meets Secure Digital specifications.
Stores data, music, pictures and videos.

Includes convenient storage / carry case.

GID ITEM ID: 00308   |   BACK TO TOP

Padded Case for Digital SLR Camera

Description
Protect your digital SLR camera with this high quality padded carrying case. This versatile case offers superior protection for your valuable equipment and is ideal for comfortable on-the-move action.

Product Features
Excellent padded protection for SLR cameras
Light Weight
Fully Padded to Protect Your Camera and Accessories
Adjustable Shoulder Strap
Weather Resistant


GID ITEM ID: 00107   |   BACK TO TOP

USB 2.0 High Speed SecureDigital™ Card Reader

A card reader is a small piece of hardware with simple Plug & Play features that connects directly to your PC via a USB port and allows you to transfer pictures & other media files without the need to plug your camera to the PC.

Rapid data transfer. Move files up to 40 times faster than a standard USB 1.1 card reader


GID ITEM ID: 00226   |   BACK TO TOP

LCD Screen Protectors

Gives you protection for the LCD screen from scratches and removes the screen glare.
Offers better contrast. Gives glare reduction.
These LCD Screen Protectors fit all Screen sizes up to 3.50"

GID ITEM ID: 00384   |   BACK TO TOP

Lens Cleaning Kit

A cleaning kit that will help you take proper and safe care of your camera, lenses, filters, and other optical equipment.

Item Includes:
Cleaning Fluid
Lens Tissue
Cotton Swabs
Soft Brush

GID ITEM ID: 00387   |   BACK TO TOP

Memory Card Wallet

Keep multiple memory cards protected and organized with this durable storage wallet. Sturdy memory card wallet case holds memory cards of any type securely, keeping them from contact with other accessories and makes them easily accessible in larger luggage bags.

General Store Policies

We are committed to providing each customer with the highest standard of customer service.

Communication is done via eBay so it is important to check your eBay messages and to have you eBay registered email address up to date.

We are required to collect state tax from NY state buyers.

The advertised price is our current lowest offer & reflects any applicable manufacturer instant rebates. There is no price protection. Purchasing this item means you agree to the above final price regardless of future price changes.

We do not sell to resellers. We reserve the right to cancel orders made by resellers.

We ship directly to buyers. We will ship only to a customer’s own private shipping address. If you need to use a freight forwarders or any forwarding agent (Aramex and such) you have to contact us for confirmation.

Digital SLR sales are limited to the quantity of one per customer. If you want to purchase more than one, please contact us first

Warranty information: unless otherwise specified, DSLR cameras and camcorders are covered by a manufacturer 12 month limited warranty – mail in service within the USA. For additional information regarding warranty coverage please contact us.
For longer coverage which also includes Accidental damage coverage against falls, spills and more, please visit our eBay store.

We reserve the right to replace the free gift with a item of equal or greater value, based on availability

Failure to meet with our store policies may result in a delay to handling and processing your order.

A valid phone number is required for all orders. It is required for shipping and may be used for payment verification.

Please commit to buy only after you decided to purchase & you are ready to pay.

Purchasing from us means you read, understood and agreed to all our policies.

Payment Policies

Complete payment must be made within 4 days of placing your order (buy-it-now option) or winning your bid.

Domestic Payment Options

PayPal

We can only ship to the address we receive from PayPal.
We cannot ship to any address you give us over the phone, email or eBay message. Please make sure you choose the correct address when you make the payment. We will not be able to change the shipping address after payment is made. If you have any questions please contact us before paying and we will be happy to help.


Credit cards

Visa, Mastercard, American Express & Discover.

We can only ship to your credit card's billing address.

We cannot bill an international credit card and ship to a USA address.


Additional Verification
Sometimes we need to contact you for additional verification. This may happen if your PayPal address is unconfirmed or if your credit card needs additional verification, or in other occasions. Please make sure your eBay phone number and email address are updated, and your spam filters allow emails from us.


International Payment Options

PayPal

We can only ship to the confirmed address we receive from PayPal. We cannot ship to any address you give us over the phone, email or eBay message. Please make sure you choose the confirmed address when you make the payment. If you have any questions please call us before paying and we will be happy to help.


Credit Cards

Visa, Mastercard, American Express & Discover - You can pay with your LOCAL card.
Please contact us for details.

We can only ship to the credit card's billing address.


Customs & Duties
International buyers are responsible for any and all customs, duties taxes and brokerage fees to be paid to the courier or government. Please contact your local customs office with further inquiries in this issue. Get It Digital assumes no responsibility with respect to any tariffs, duties, or any and all other charges requested or required by destination countries.

Additional Verification
Sometimes we need to contact you for additional verification. This may happen if your PayPal address is unconfirmed or if your credit card needs additional verification, or in other occasions. Please make sure your eBay phone number and email address are updated, and your spam filters allow emails from us.


General Shipping Policies

We can only ship to a verified address.

We cannot ship To: P.O. Boxes & APO/FPO.

We ship directly to buyers. We will ship only to a customer’s own private shipping address. If you need to use a freight forwarders or any forwarding agent (Aramex and such) you have to contact us for confirmation.

Packages of value higher than $250 require a signature upon delivery.

We usually ship within 1-3 business days of receiving cleared payment. Please note that weekends & holidays are not business days.
This processing time is required for all shipments, Express as well as standard.
Please call us and speak with a representative if you need your package to be shipped faster.

The carrier will send the package back to us after 3 unsuccessful attempts to deliver; if this happens you will be charged additional shipping charge of double the shipping cost (the cost of shipping back and forth).

You cannot choose the carrier and we cannot use the customer's account to ship an item.

We cannot reroute a shipment after it has left the warehouse. Please make sure that someone is available to sign for your package at the ship-to address.

We cannot add special instructions note for the carrier. The carrier will arrive at the ship-to address and you will have to sign for the package.

If your package was damaged during transit a claim needs to be filed with the carrier. You must keep the box and all packing material for the carrier to inspect. Please contact us if you have questions.

Please note: an up to date phone number is required. Please make sure your info on eBay/PayPal includes a valid phone number.


Domestic Shipping

Please read the above General Shipping Policies and also note:

If you are shipping to Alaska, Hawaii or Porto Rico, you must choose 2nd day or one day shipping. Please note that due to FedEx restrictions some destinations may take 2-3 business days, even if you choose overnight service.
All buyers from other US territories around the globe please contact us for shipping info and quote.

We will email you the tracking number once it is available.

International Shipping

International customers are welcome! We currently offer shipping to over 100 countries, please contact us for shipping info.

The shipping cost stated in this listing is valid only for the 48 contiguous US states.

A valid phone number is required for all orders. It is required for shipping and may be used for payment verification.

Please read the above General Shipping Policies and also note:

Shipping to the following countries has sometims been problematic, and may require additional verification upon completion of the transaction:
Afghanistan, Algeria, Angola, Argentina, Armenia, Azerbaijan Republic, Bangladesh, Belarus, Benin, Bhutan, Botswana, Brazil, Burkina Faso, Burundi, Cameroon, Cape Verde Islands, Central African Republic, Chad, Comoros, Congo, Cote d Ivoire (Ivory Coast), Djibouti, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Falkland Islands (Islas Malvinas), Gabon Republic, Gambia, Ghana, Guinea-Bissau, India, Indonesia, Iraq, Kenya, Kiribati, Kyrgyzstan, Liberia, Libya, Malawi, Mali, Mauritania, Mayotte, Mozambique, Namibia, Nauru, Nepal, Niger, Pakistan, Russian Federation, Rwanda, Saint Pierre and Miquelon, San Marino, Senegal, Seychelles, Sierra Leone, Singapore, Solomon Islands, Somalia, Swaziland, Tajikistan, Tanzania, Togo, Tonga, Tunisia, Turkey, Turkmenistan, Tuvalu, Uganda, Ukraine, Uzbekistan, Yemen, Zambia, Zimbabwe.
Please take into account the possibility that in some cases we may have to cancel the sale.

International buyers are responsible for any and all customs, duties taxes and brokerage fees to be paid to the courier or government.
Please contact your local customs office with further inquiries in this issue. Get It Digital assumes no responsibility with respect to any tariffs, duties, or any and all other charges requested or required by destination countries.

Every international shipment might be delayed by destination country authorities. If your package is delayed by customs you will have to call your local customs office to find out what is holding it. We have no way of giving you better information when a package is delayed by customs. Customs delays, if occur, are not part of stated delivery times.

Return Policies

If there is any problem with the item please email us before leaving feedback. We solve all issues.

All returns must be approved before you ship any item back to us.
if you ship an item back to us without contacting us first, we will have to refuse the package & it will be returned to you.

Shipping and handling charges are not refundable. All returned packages will be charged return shipping.

Returned items are reviewed by us upon receiving them and must be sent back to us in exactly the same condition as they were sent to you. All items must be in the exact same condition as we sent them and in original unopened boxes. All internal packing materials, instruction manuals and all additional items and accessories must also be included for any replacement, exchange, or refund. The restocking fee for items that comply with these requirements is 5%.
Any item that does not meet the above conditions is not eligible for a return.

Refusing a delivery is not an acceptable way to return it. All returns must be pre-approved. Refused packages will be treated as an unauthorized return and will be charged 5% restocking fee + double the shipping cost (the carrier is charging us for both ways). Make sure we authorized your return.

If you have any questions regarding our return policy please contact us

Contact Us

International: 1.718.554.7299
Send Us a Message
